About Me

Hi. I am Mehmet, a full-stack web developer from Austin, TX.

BIO

I've always loved building things and putting things back together. Although my professional path has taken a slight twist from electrical engineering to software development, my passion about technology hasn't changed a bit.

As a web developer, my goal is to build high quality responsive websites. As a human, my ultimate mission is to create things that make a positive impact on millions of people.

Austin Devs LLC (May 2018 - Present)

Front End Developer
  • Use Storybook to build reusable and testable components for data manipulations and to display data in company standard format.
  • Implement fast and adaptive UI components by using NativeBase.io.
  • Work on redux modules to retrieve data from API calls.
  • Style responsive pages for mobile browser users as per requirements in React Native.

Enola Labs (Jan 2018 - May 2018)

Front End Developer
  • Created scalable React components to dynamically render dashboard data to enable clean, maintainable, and reusable code.
  • Utilized Redux for API calls and persistent states to enable a scalable modular web application.
  • Developed unit tests for widgets using Jest framework.
  • Implemented page designs using HTML5 and CSS3, including Flexbox and CSS-grid layouts.
  • Attended daily agile scrum meetings and participated in effective reporting and communication with project manager and developers.

Austin Coding Academy (Jan 2017 - Sep 2017)

Full-Stack Web Development Certification
  • Acquired knowledge in computer science, learning the fundamentals of Javascript, React, and Redux applications.
  • Created applications using async development techniques,using variety of data structures and algorithms that were learned during the program.
  • Implemented prototype and object delegation.
  • Utilized development techniques such as promises, async,and network requests.
